name: Knapsack Without Repetition
problem-statement: Description of the knapsack optimization problem with repetition

input.weights: array of item weights, where entry i represents the weight of item i
input.values: array of item values, where entry i represents the value of item i

output.result: The maximum value that can be attained with a knapsack of capacity W
output.solution: An array of the item indices that lead to this maximum value

provided-solution.tableEntryDefinition: T[ i ][ j ] Is the maximum value obtainable with a knapsack of capacity i using the first j items.
